verses.roman:
tasmāl lokam imaṁ rājan
svapna-māyā-manoratham
vīkṣyāyamyātmanātmānaṁ
samaḥ śānto bhava prabho

synonyms: tasmāt—therefore; lokam—world; imam—this; rājan—O King; svapna—as a dream; māyā—a magic trick; manaḥ-ratham—or a fantasy in the mind; vīkṣya—seeing; āyamya—bringing under control; ātmanā—by intelligence; ātmānam—the mind; samaḥ—equal; śāntaḥ—peaceful; bhava—become; prabho—my dear master.
translation: Therefore, O King, looking upon this world as a dream, a magician's illusion or a flight of fancy, please control your mind with intelligence and become equipoised and peaceful, my lord.
